title: Will technology ever overtake mankind? - Quora

response.answer_text: Probably. The only reason mankind can easily surpass basically all technology is because of our genes and our brain. Both are so extremely complex, DNA can store up to 1 petabyte per gram and the human brain can process 500 times faster than the fastest technological computer ever created and requires 750000 times less power it. When technology surpasses that, we wil have no use for our organic bodies

Technology always has dominated life. For example, you can go back two hundred years when Eli Whitney developed interchangeable parts. This allowed worn parts to be replaced. Today, this is part of our fabric of living. Technology is the utilization of original and innovative ideas. This is definitely not a new concept.
